channel.title: Client fails?
channel.description: http://lolerscapes.smfforfree2.com/pages/lolerscapes/client.php says that i dont have java installed... and yet i can play others servers... i followed the tutoirals all the way through but it fails my HTML [code] Lolerscape Client</html> </head> <body> <applet code="Client.class" archive="Lolerscape.jar" width="700px" height="700px"> Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run<br /><br />Get the latest Java technology at <a href="http://www.java.com/">http://www.java.com/</a> </applet> </body> </html> [/code]

item.title: Client fails?

item.description:

Wow that was alot to type D:
